Robin.name: Robin
Robin.appearance: 80s teased feather-do, leg warmers, tiny sunglasses
Robin.personality: Overprotective and anxious but incredibly loving
Robin.quirk: Carries a tiny whistle and uses binoculars too big for her body
Robin.special_ability: Eagle-eyed lookout who spots danger (and snacks) from miles away

Wilma.name: Wilma
Wilma.appearance: Curly red hair, sparkly apron with magical pockets
Wilma.personality: Warm, wise, unpredictable; laughs at her own jokes
Wilma.quirk: Her gifts always solve problems in unexpected ways
Wilma.special_ability: Can pull surprisingly useful items from her apron pockets

Mike.name: Mike
Mike.appearance: Scruffy red beard, toolbelt of odd items, mismatched socks
Mike.personality: Witty, clever, sarcastic, prone to terrible puns
Mike.quirk: Will only help if you can out-rhyme him
Mike.special_ability: Can summon objects from his pockets after a rhyme battle

Bloop.name: Bloop
Bloop.appearance: See-through body with glowing magical tattoos
Bloop.personality: Gentle, shy but brilliant, speaks in bubbles
Bloop.quirk: Gets brighter when happy, dimmer when sad
Bloop.special_ability: Can light up memories or dreams in the water

Cogsley.name: Cogsley
Cogsley.appearance: Brass gears visible through glass panels, tiny monocle
Cogsley.quirk: Always knows exactly what time it is everywhere
Cogsley.special_ability: Can slow down or rewind time for 30 seconds

Zara Moonwhistle.name: Zara Moonwhistle
Zara Moonwhistle.appearance: Cloak made of starlight, speaks in mysterious half-riddles
Zara Moonwhistle.personality: Mysterious, encouraging, appears when hope is lowest
Zara Moonwhistle.quirk: Only appears at night or in the darkest moments
Zara Moonwhistle.special_ability: Can whisper dreams into lanterns that come true
